fixes.name: Avg. Time to Delivery
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau AVG over an expression is translated to AVERAGEX in DAX. This measure iterates rows of 'Data (EJB)', computes the row-level difference between 'Date Delivered' and 'Date Ordered', and returns the average of those differences.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregation (AVG), so it must be created as a measure.
